objects.text:
1080P RESOLUTION | 75Hz REFRESH RATE
1800R CURVED DISPLAY | HDMI & VGA PORTS

product_details.description: 24 Diagonal viewable curved screen HDMI, VGA & PC audio in ports Windows 10 compatible Contemporary sleek metal design with the C248W-1920RN, a slender 1800R screen curvature yields wide-ranging images that seemingly surround you. Protection and comfort are the hallmarks of this design as the metal pattern brush finish is smooth and pleasing to the touch. 1080P resolution (1920 x 1080 pixels) provides stunning color and picture detail on a 24 inch screen. Enjoy HDMI or VGA input to connect all video and gaming devices. Contrast Ratio : 3000: 1 1800R curve monitor the curved display delivers a revolutionary visual experience with a leading 1800R screen curvature as the images appear to wrap around you for an in depth, immersive experience Hdmi, VGA & PC audio in ports High refresh rate 75Hz.Brightness (cd/m²):250 cd/m2 Vesa wall mount ready; Lamp Life: 30,000+ Hours Windows 10 Sceptre Monitors are fully compatible with Windows 10, the most recent operating System available on PCs.Brightness: 220 cd/M2 Pixel Pitch: 0.27156mm (H) x 0.27156 mm (V) 75 hertz Brand - Sceptre ** Screen Size - 24 Inches ** Resolution - FHD 1080p ** Aspect Ratio - 16:9 ** Screen Surface Description - Matte **

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a modern and vibrant design to highlight a tech product, specifically a curved monitor. The layout centers on a high-quality product image ("product_image") placed against a futuristic gradient background ("background") with radial glow effects. The main title ("heading") sits at the top in bold, white uppercase font for strong visual impact, followed by a subheading ("subheading") in a sleek, bright cyan typeface. Below the image, a feature description block ("description") provides concise specs in a clean white font. The price ("price") is emphasized in bold hot pink, and a call-to-action button ("cta") is located at the bottom with a matching cyan rectangle background ("cta_background") and white uppercase text.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Blue: #0d1c2e
- Deep Violet: #1e0d2e
- Cyan Blue: #00b8ff
- Hot Pink: #ff0044
- Pure White: #ffffff
- Soft Black (#000610) gradient in foreground
product_color: The product image showcases a Sceptre curved monitor with a vibrant, high-contrast background that effectively highlights its digital display. The color palette is energetic and diverse, blending bold hues and smooth gradients. The key colors used are Electric Cyan (#00BCD4), Bright Magenta (#E91E63), Vibrant Yellow (#FFEB3B), Deep Blue (#3F51B5), and Fiery Orange (#FF5722). These saturated tones blend seamlessly with soft transitions while being accentuated by water droplets, giving a dynamic, fluid visual. White (#FFFFFF) is used prominently for the brand logo, creating stark contrast and visibility. These colors together evoke modernity, performance, and visual excitement—ideal for tech advertisement banners.
